unnormalised: Why, oh why, are you ghosting me? Is it the shipping costs? (Okay, I'll admit, getting something from Meerut to Mumbai can sting the wallet a bit). Is it the payment options? (We accept Paytm, PhonePe, even good old net banking, unlike some online vendors who only take dollars!). Or maybe, just maybe, you got distracted by a particularly spicy episode of Bigg Boss and completely forgot you were about to buy that handloom kurta? I wouldn’t blame you for that last one.
